titles.title: Fair Nutrition for American Citizens Act of 2003
To amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to increase the amount payable to the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico to provide nutrition assistance under such Act.
Fair Nutrition for American Citizens Act of 2003

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.

committee.name: House Agriculture
committee.subcommittee: Commodity Markets, Digital Assets, and Rural Development

bill.summary: Fair Nutrition for American Citizens Act of 2003 - Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to increase block grant nutrition assistance for the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico and American Samoa.
